title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, September 8, 2020
description: It was on this day 100 years ago that the first transcontinental U.S. airmail service began, from New York to San Francisco.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It was on this day 100 years ago that the first transcontinental U.S. airmail service began, from New York to San Francisco.
itunes:summary: It was on this day 100 years ago that the first transcontinental U.S. airmail service began, from New York to San Francisco.
